message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. I believe it has the potential to bring significant benefits to your business or personal life. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a competitive price considering its value to me, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I believe it's a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to make a serious investment in this product if the price is right.
